statements: DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit' AND transaction_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2021-01-01' AND transaction_type = 'withdraw';
DELETE FROM player_purchases WHERE player_id = 500 AND item_price > 50;
DELETE FROM player_purchases WHERE player_id = 500 AND purchase_date < '2021-10-15';
DELETE FROM player_purchases WHERE player_id = 100 AND price > 50.00;
DELETE FROM player_transactions WHERE player_id = 123 AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM player_purchases WHERE purchase_id = 456 OR price < 50;
